::Shredder::

Shredder puts the pod back down in front of the predacon base.

"Thanks," he says to the two bots that had helped him drag it. He activates 
his comm-link.

"Sub-commander," he says into it insultingly, stressing the 'sub', "The pod 
that you asked for is here."
